snippet: The court reconfirmed a corruption conviction of former President Hosni Mubarak amid signals from the authorities that he may soon be released.
abstract: Egyptian court reissues three-year sentence originally handed down to former Pres Hosni Mubarak in 2014 amid suggestions that hey may be released from prison; legal experts have argued that there is no justification for Mubarak's continued detention.
lead_paragraph: The court reconfirmed a corruption conviction of former President Hosni Mubarak amid signals from the authorities that he may soon be released.
